results.name: n multiplied by the least nonzero digit missing from its factorial base representation: a(n) = n * A257079(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10080
Eric Angelini, et al, "Multiply by the fantom digit", Discussion on Seqfan-list
xref: A255411 gives the fixed points, positions where a(n) = n.
Cf. A257079, A257081 (number of iterations needed before a fixed point is reached).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Apr 15 2015
